snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. is the highest-ranking Democrat interested in running for president, yet the heir apparent seems to be Hillary Clinton.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr is highest-ranking Democrat interested in running for president in 2016, but he would likely be underdog to former first lady and secretary of state Hillary Clinton, should she run.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. is the highest-ranking Democrat interested in running for president, yet the heir apparent seems to be Hillary Clinton.

headline.seo: If He Runs in 2016, Biden Faces Role as Underdog
headline.main: Early Line for 2016: A Vice President Who’s an Underdog
headline.print_headline: Early Line for 2016 Shows a Vice President Who’s Not the Favorite
